title: Request a Seller's Property Disclosure
description: A buyer is interested in a property but the seller's disclosure statement is not attached to the MLS listing.

tasks.description: Identify the listing agent for the property from the MLS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the name and contact email for the listing agent.

tasks.description: Draft and send an email to the listing agent formally requesting a copy of the Seller's Disclosure.
tasks.expected_outcome: A professional request email is sent.

tasks.description: Once received, forward the disclosure document to the buyer client for their review.
tasks.expected_outcome: The document is promptly sent to the client.
